job_purpose: Design and build a next-gen safety platform for road workers, contributing to real-time hazard detection and protection in high-risk environments.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Contribute to the design, development, and deployment of the real-time road safety platform
Build and maintain full-stack solutions using C#, C++ and modern web technologies
Integrate data from wearables, vehicles, sensors, and base stations for actionable safety insights
Help scale and automate the 'Safety-as-a-Service' cloud platform (AWS-based)
Participate in testing, including hands-on hardware integration and occasional fieldwork
Collaborate with other engineers in code reviews and design sessions
Support cross-functional teams including Operations and Sales
Take initiative on technical research, documentation, and non-coding tasks
required_qualifications: Strong C# or C++ programming skills
Experience in full-stack development in collaborative team settings
Proactive mindset with a focus on system improvement
Strong communication skills and willingness to share ideas
Enthusiasm for solving real-world problems with practical tech
Hold full working rights in Australia
preferred_qualifications: Experience in DevOps: AWS, Linux, CI/CD pipelines, Terraform, Puppet
Experience in AI & Data: Computer Vision, Machine Learning, real-time data streaming
Experience in Web Technologies: Dashboards, APIs, relational databases
company_details: Acusensus is an ASX-listed Australian tech company focused on road safety solutions. They aim to reduce road trauma through innovative technology and have a global impact. The company values Impact, Collaboration, Integrity, and Care in its work culture.
